code: import{isIphoneX}from"react-native-iphone-x-helper";import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import StatusBar from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StatusBar";import Dimensions from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Dimensions";var _Dimensions$get=Dimensions.get("window"),height=_Dimensions$get.height,width=_Dimensions$get.width;var standardLength=width>height?width:height;var offset=width>height?0:Platform.OS==="ios"?78:StatusBar.currentHeight;var deviceHeight=isIphoneX()||Platform.OS==="android"?standardLength-offset:standardLength;export function RFPercentage(percent){var heightPercent=percent*deviceHeight/100;return Math.round(heightPercent);}export function RFValue(fontSize){var standardScreenHeight=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:680;var heightPercent=fontSize*deviceHeight/standardScreenHeight;return Math.round(heightPercent);}
